ramo-primaveral.title: Spring Bouquet
ramo-primaveral.description: A cheerful and colorful bouquet that captures the essence of spring. Composed of seasonal flowers such as daisies, lilies, freesias and more, depending on availability. Ideal for brightening any corner or giving pure positive energy.

rosas-nacionales.title: National Roses
rosas-nacionales.description: Cultivated with dedication on Argentine soil, our national roses offer natural beauty at an excellent price. Vibrant colors and guaranteed freshness. A classic option that never fails.

rosas-premium.title: Premium Roses
rosas-premium.description: Imported roses with long stems and large buds. Their intense color and superior durability make them the ideal choice for those seeking to make an elegant impact. Perfect for anniversaries, proposals or special moments.

follaje-decorativo.title: Decorative Foliage
follaje-decorativo.description: Fresh foliage to complement your floral arrangements.

arreglo-funebre-corona.title: Funeral Wreath Arrangement
arreglo-funebre-corona.description: A traditional funeral wreath to express your condolences.

arreglo-funebre-cruz.title: Funeral Cross Arrangement
arreglo-funebre-cruz.description: A floral arrangement in the shape of a cross, suitable for funeral services.

arreglo-funebre-en-forma-de-corazon.title: Funeral Heart-Shaped Arrangement
arreglo-funebre-en-forma-de-corazon.description: A delicate floral heart to pay tribute to a loved one.

centro-de-mesa-funebre.title: Funeral Centerpiece
centro-de-mesa-funebre.description: A sober and elegant floral centerpiece, ideal for accompanying wakes or intimate farewells.

arreglo-funebre-cruz-2.title: Funeral Cross Arrangement 2
arreglo-funebre-cruz-2.description: A floral arrangement in the shape of a cross, suitable for funeral services.

florero-de-cristal-clasico.title: Classic Crystal Vase
florero-de-cristal-clasico.description: A classic crystal vase, perfect for any floral arrangement.

florero-de-ceramica-rustico.title: Rustic Ceramic Vase
florero-de-ceramica-rustico.description: A ceramic vase with a rustic finish, ideal for a country touch.

florero-de-vidrio-moderno.title: Modern Glass Vase
florero-de-vidrio-moderno.description: A modern design vase, ideal for contemporary arrangements.

vela-aromatica-de-lavanda.title: Lavender Aromatic Candle
vela-aromatica-de-lavanda.description: Handcrafted candle with a relaxing lavender scent, ideal for setting the mood in any space.

difusor-de-ambiente-vainilla.title: Vanilla Room Diffuser
difusor-de-ambiente-vainilla.description: Room diffuser with reeds, with a sweet and warm vanilla scent.

diseno-exclusivo-1.title: Exclusive Design 1
diseno-exclusivo-1.description: A cheerful and colorful bouquet that captures the essence of spring. Composed of seasonal flowers such as daisies, lilies, freesias and more, depending on availability. Ideal for brightening any corner or giving pure positive energy.

diseno-exclusivo-2.description: A cheerful and colorful bouquet that captures the essence of spring. Composed of seasonal flowers such as daisies, lilies, freesias and more, depending on availability. Ideal for brightening any corner or giving pure positive energy.
